00001 #include "fontdisplay.h"
00002 #include <QPainter>

00007 FontDisplay::FontDisplay(bool bug, bool direct) {
00008     m_bug = bug;
00009     m_direct = direct;
00010     m_border = 4;
00011 }
00012 
00013 void
00014 FontDisplay::drawText(QPaintDevice *dev, const float border) const {
00015 
00016     // set up the painter
00017     QPainter p(dev);
00018     p.setFont(font());
00019     p.setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00020     p.translate(border, border);
00021 
00022     // determine the bounding box
00023     QRectF textbox;
00024     float ascent, descent;
00025     QFontMetricsF *fm;
00026     if (m_bug) {
00027         fm = new QFontMetricsF(p.font());
00028     } else {
00029         fm = new QFontMetricsF(font());
00030     }
00031     textbox = fm->boundingRect(m_text);
00032     ascent = fm->ascent();
00033     descent = fm->descent();
00034     delete fm;
00035 
00036     // translate the painter with respect to the font baseline
00037     // float yoff = -textbox.y();
00038     p.translate(0, (int)ascent);
00039 
00040     // draw the ascent and the descent
00041     p.fillRect(QRectF(textbox.x(), 0, textbox.width(), descent), Qt::red);
00042     p.fillRect(QRectF(textbox.x(), -ascent, textbox.width(), ascent), Qt::red);
00043 
00044     // draw string on its boundingRect
00045     p.fillRect(textbox, Qt::blue);
00046     p.drawText(QPointF(0, 0), m_text);
00047 
00048     // draw the baseline
00049     // p.fillRect(QRectF(textbox.x(), -0.5, textbox.width(), 1), Qt::yellow);
00050 
00051     p.end();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void
00055 FontDisplay::setText(const QString &text) {
00056     m_text = text;
00057     drawText();
00058 }
00059 void
00060 FontDisplay::drawText() {
00061 
00062     // draw the string to a picture
00063     QPicture pict;
00064     drawText(&pict, 0);
00065 
00066     // create a pixmap to draw the string on
00067     QRect pictrect = pict.boundingRect();
00068     int border = 4;
00069     int w = pict.width()+2*border;
00070     int h = pict.height()+2*border;
00071     QPixmap pix(w, h);
00072     pix.fill();
00073 
00074     // draw the string to a pixmap
00075     if (m_direct) {
00076         drawText(&pix, m_border);
00077     } else {
00078         QPainter p(&pix);
00079         p.drawPicture(QPointF(border, border), pict);
00080         p.end();
00081     }
00082 
00083     // blow up the image
00084     QImage qi = pix.toImage();
00085     qi = qi.scaled(pix.width()*4, pix.height()*4);
00086     pix = pix.fromImage(qi);
00087 
00088     // draw the image
00089     setPixmap(pix);
00090     update();
00091 }
00092 void
00093 FontDisplay::setBold(bool b) {
00094     QFont f = font();
00095     f.setBold(b);
00096     setFont(f);
00097     drawText();
00098 }

00100 FontDisplay::setItalic(bool i) {

00102     f.setItalic(i);
00103     setFont(f);
00104     drawText();

00106 void
00107 FontDisplay::setPointSize(int size) {
